tool.name: miRNATranslate

data.name: outxt
data.label: ${refpath.name} | ${tool.name} | Merged miRNA candidates form annotated and predicted miRNAs

tool.help:
|
.. class:: donemark
**What it does**
This function is designed to translate annotated and predicted miRNAs into the genomic coordinate system.
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
Output from **miRNARetrival** and **miRNAPredict**.
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
A list of miRNA and miRNA precursors with a uniform format, which have 12 columns containing the location, sequence, length of miRNA precursors, 5' arm, 3'arm, the arm of mature miRNAs, and miRNA source.
|
